description_data.value: ** RESERVED ** This candidate has been reserved by an organization or individual that will use it when announcing a new security problem. When the candidate has been publicized, the details for this candidate will be provided.

descriptions.value: A reflected cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability exists in the MT Safeline X-Ray X3310 webserver version NXG 19.05 that enables a remote attacker to execute JavaScript code and obtain sensitive information in a victim's browser.

Existe una vulnerabilidad de Cross Site Scripting (XSS) reflejado en la versión NXG 19.05 del servidor web MT Safeline X-Ray X3310 que permite a un atacante remoto ejecutar código JavaScript y obtener información confidencial en el navegador de la víctima.
